channel.title: Write you a Scheme on The Quiescent Current

item.title: Write a Scheme (Log)
item.description: Running post/diary of my Write You a Scheme I’m testing the idea of an Luhmann Index, or Map of Content, as this work log expands to link into posts and interestingness the effort generates. 2022-04-15 Basic Parsing work. I can parse some patterns into Either types or parse error. Questions What is a combinator?
